Articles.Content:
Sooooo, it's one in the morning right now, and I'm on the KSP forums because I've finished Christmas partying and have a bit of a caffeine or other depressants to work off. Apologies for any lack of grammar.

Mhm. So, I was wondering, especially in the Add-Ons section of the forum if there could be a [Plugin] [Part] tag because a lot of plugins nowadays also contain parts.

Okay, now I can go stumble off to bed. I've spent upwards of half an hour trying to make the fingers go where they should at the right time.

Edited December 26, 2014 by DuoDex
I suppose it'd be possible, but it'd have to be a third, separate tag.
